html: (2 Nephi 18:18)."I and the children … are for signs and for wonders in Israel from the Lord." The very names of Isaiah and his children are given as signs of the veracity of the prophet's words. Isaiah's name means "Jehovah saves;" Shear-jashub means "a remnant shall return;" and Maher-shalal-hash-baz means "he hastens the prey." These names are constant reminders to Israel's twelve tribes of the Lord's threats of disaster and of His promises of restoration.
